author: remm
msg: - So, compile in AJP on APR, and enable it if APR is present.
- Obviously, it's experimental, but I don't think anyone will bother with even
basic testing if it's not at least compiled.

author: mturk
msg: Crash with "Environment" variables that do not contain "%".

msg: Crash with "Environment" variables that do not contain "%".
